content: Actually, my family and I went on a 5-day road trip to the Outer Banks about a month ago, and it was amazing! We drove down on a Friday evening and stopped at a hotel in Elizabeth City for the night. The next morning, we drove to the Cape Hatteras National Seashore and spent the day surfing and swimming. I tried surfing for the first time and managed to catch a few waves, but also wiped out a lot! On the way back, we stopped at a seafood restaurant in Nags Head and had a huge plate of fish and chips. There are so many great places to explore along the coast, and I'm excited to go back and discover more. Do you have any recommendations for other coastal towns or attractions that are worth visiting?
